content: बाह्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बहिर्भवः ष्यञ् टिलोपः] {@--1@} Outer, outward, external, exterior, being or situated without; विरहः किमिवानुतापयेद्वद बाह्यैर्विषयैर्विपश्चितं <ls>R. 8. 89</ls>; बाह्योद्यान <ls>Me. 7</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 46</ls>; बाह्यनामन् ‘the outer name’, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the address or superscription written on the back of a letter; अदत्तबाह्यतामानं लेखं लेखयित्वा <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Foreign, strange; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Excluded from, out of the pale of; जातास्तदूर्वोरुपमानबाह्याः <ls>Ku. 1. 36.</ls> {@--4@} Expelled from society, outcast. --ह्यः {@--1@} A stranger, foreigner; <ls>Pt. 1. 259</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">5. 26.</ls> {@--2@} One who is excommunicated, an outcast. --ह्यं, बाह्येन, बाह्ये {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Outside, on the outside, externally.
